channel.title: Spells (teleport locations) + (Damage)
channel.description:
basically changing this is quite easy, the only problem is finding it. So this is what I exactly want to do, is change the varrock teleport coords. Also want to change how much damage a certain spell does.
E.g: making wind strike hit 20s (may seem crazy, but it would be nice to know).
So in which file? Im just starting my search now if no one is willing to tell me.

item.title: Spells (teleport locations) + (Damage)
item.dc:creator: @Duch-PRO Duch-PRO
item.description:
@Duch-PRO wrote:

[quote="[A"]mpd link=topic=379092.msg2853839#msg2853839 date=1246716772]
LOL!

Duch-PRO, you’re a retard. How can you tell people to “act normal” (whatever the fuck that means), when you don’t even know what you’re talking about? The OP asked for help with some XML editing, not help with setting up his god damn compiler!

Do us all a favor and GTFO.[/quote]

Thanks…

And yeah soz it’s wrong topic I copied and pasted lol…

Thanks [A]mpd
Love you too… -.-

item.title: Spells (teleport locations) + (Damage)
item.dc:creator: @Duch-PRO Duch-PRO
item.description:
@Duch-PRO wrote:

[quote=“meatstick, post:7, topic:286656”][quote author=Duch-PRO link=topic=379092.msg2853043#msg2853043 date=1246656936]

with SpellAggressiveLvl.xml how can you tell which spell is which? is it just in order?

no they put them out of order for fun and to make you work…

Lol, it’s really easy, I even did it by myself without even knowing what I was doing

If you right click on the compiler, choose edit.
It should open with notepad, which gives you a directory from a java executeable file.
Copy that, and replace it somewhere, and you will notice that it does not exist.
Delete some folders untill it does work. Then replace that number(s) which you will find there into your notepad file. (I had to replace these numbers:
…_06 into …_13.). If you save the compiler it should work fine.

I hope this made any sence to you.

Duch-pro
[/quote]
lol.[/quote]

Got anything more to say then lol?
Noob, this is called spam you know? Look it up in the agreement… -.-

If you don’t get it, act normal…

Read full topic
